examInstructions.description: Replaces the top-level instruction text on the CHA exam pages (each page after starting page)

boneConduction.description: Not implemented in TabSINT - If true, enable output to bone conductor

playStimulus.description: Not implemented in TabSINT - If true, show the tones presented at each frequency on a seperate chart.

minLevel.description: Minimum level the user can select for playing tones.  Hardware limited.

maxLevel.description: Maximum level the user can select for playing tones.  Hardware limited.

masking.description: Not implemented in TabSINT - If true, enable masking.

onlySubmitFrequenciesTested.Description: If true, only generate results for frequencies tested.  Default: false, submit all

exportToCSV.description: Whether result should be exported to CSV upon submitting exam results.

presentationList.description: Array of frequencies to run in manual audiometry. Does not support DynamicStartLevel.

id.description: Custom presentationId to use for each frequency.
